comments:
+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #200805 +++

Build ID: I20070625-1500

Steps To Reproduce:
Happens on OpenEmbeDD bundle (including ATL 2.0 features) : http://openembedd.org/experimental/bundle/OpenEmbeDD_full_platform_WinXP_Linux-x86_MacOSX_EXPERIMENTAL.zip
1. Download and run the OpenEmbeDD platform
2. create a new configuration : eclipse application
Select "Run an application" (default "ide.workbench"
3. Run this configuration => the error message below

  ------- Comment  #1 From Dennis Wagelaar  2007-09-28 05:29:43 -0400  [reply] -------

1. Isn't this an AM3 bug?
2. I remember having an issue like this with AM3 about a month ago, but it has
been solved since then. Can you check against the latest ATL/AM3 from CVS?

causedBy.message: The value 'AM3Repository' is not a valid enumerator of 'LocationType'
